bookmark_confirmation_delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this bookmark? This action cannot be undone.

bookmark_confirmation_delete_all_broken.message: Are you sure you want to delete all broken bookmarks? This action cannot be undone.

bookmark_confirmation_repair_all_redirec.message: Are you sure you want to change the URLs for all redirected bookmarks? This action cannot be undone.

bookmark_confirmation_repair_redirect.message: Are you sure you want to change the URL of this bookmark? This action cannot be undone.

bookmark_confirmation_whitelist.message: Are you sure you want this bookmark to be permanently ignored?

extension_description.message: With the Bookmarks Organizer it's easy to put order in your bookmarks. The Bookmarks Organizer finds no longer working bookmarks, redirects, duplicates and more!

intro_check.message: Checking the bookmarks may take several minutes, depending on the selected mode, the number of bookmarks and the Internet speed. Please note that during the check for broken bookmarks the loading of websites can be slowed down noticeably.

omnibox_default_description.message: Check all your bookmarks for errors, redirects, duplicates, …

permission_description.message: In order for the check for broken bookmarks to work, it is technically necessary to grant permission to access the data for all websites.

search_label.message: Type name or URL to filter results…

some_marked_bookmarks.message: Looks like we could clean up a little here!

whitelist_reset_confirmation_msg.message: Do you really want to reset the whitelist?
